definition: to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: Operators of its secure communications system can guide friendly aircraft against enemy planes.
sentences.chinese: 其安全系統的操作者能導引友機對抗敵機。

sentences.english: A preparer doesn't buy any raw material, and invoices a service to the operator.
sentences.chinese: 準備者不負責購買原料，僅爲操作者提供服務。

sentences.english: Traditional espresso machines require the operator to manually create the espresso.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的濃縮咖啡機需要操作者親自動手才能進行生產。

sentences.english: There should be metal gloves provided for electric scissors and electric saws operators. Refer to attachment.
sentences.chinese: 剪和電鋸的操作者應配戴金屬手套作保護。

sentences.english: The operator removes barrels, and that is the end of a filling cycle.
sentences.chinese: 操作者移開滿桶，一個灌裝循環結束。

sentences.english: In a joint state-private enterprise, the private owner is more active as an operator.
sentences.chinese: 公私合營企業中，私方作爲企業的操作者更具主動性。

sentences.english: At last, the operator moves away the full container and one filling cycle is end.
sentences.chinese: 操作者移開滿桶，一個灌裝循環結束。

sentences.english: The quality of the smears, both LBC and CS, depends mainly on practitioner dexterity.
sentences.chinese: 二者的製片質量都決定於操作者的熟練程度。

sentences.english: The integrated operator guidance system supports the user in the machine operation.
sentences.chinese: 隨機配帶的操作者提示功能是對操作者最大的支持。

sentences.english: The integrated operator guidance system supports the user in the machine operation.
sentences.chinese: 隨機配帶的操作者提示功能是對操作者最大的支持。

sentences.english: Operators of Keithley products must be protected from electric shock at all times.
sentences.chinese: Keithley產品的操作者必須防止電擊危險。

sentences.english: Visual and clear downhole images obtained with BTV unit provide enough downhole information for operator.
sentences.chinese: 提供給遠程操作者以明確的井下狀況和足夠的信息。

sentences.english: The operator sits on a seat attached on the motion base.
sentences.chinese: 操作者坐於座椅上，座椅固定於運動模擬器的上方。

sentences.english: After receipt of the letter of non-compliance the operator will be given the opportunity to implement corrective measures.
sentences.chinese: 收到不符合通知後，操作者有機會實施整改措施。

sentences.english: Responsibility for the accuracy of hole location is taken from the operator and given to the jig.
sentences.chinese: 保證孔定位精度的責任從操作者身上轉移到了鑽模上。

sentences.english: The mobile operator validates that the mobile user is not barred.
sentences.chinese: 移動操作者確認移動用戶並未被禁止。

definition: to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)
